title: ‘We’re just pawns in the game’: Rider frustration boils over at Vuelta a España
content:
Remco Evenepoel hints at rider protest during Sunday's stage: 'We deserve some more respect, but it looks like [race organizers] really don't care.'

Read the full article at ‘We’re just pawns in the game’: Rider frustration boils over at Vuelta a España on Velo.
